channel.title: Fullscreen
channel.description: is there a way to make my server full screen? do i just download a client that already has it? or do i have to move my shit around on the server. some info would help

item.title: Fullscreen
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

You are all wrong.

You have to make a boolean to check if your on fullscreen or not if you are you have to make it change gameframe sizes in which you will need to make a new public void resetImageProducer2() { for which is everything that handles gameframe then you will make it check if there on full screen or not if they are it will use that one. ect

Read full topic

item.title: Fullscreen
item.dc:creator: @gvm2000 gvm2000
item.description:
@gvm2000 wrote:

Create a new screen or just edit a client size with “Visual studio”, its simple and fast. And there are plenty of tutorials on how to do that with “Visual studio”.

Read full topic
